      • setMouseEvents

        private void setMouseEvents()
        Get the Mouse X and Y, fixed for the arena Check if the mouse is colliding with any robots Delete any robots which are colliding with the mouse If there are no robots colliding, create a new roamdot robot in that location When mouse is released, draw the system

      • mainmenu

        private javafx.scene.layout.HBox mainmenu()
        Creates a number of buttons which have different functions. Not all buttons have to be returned so some redundant or inactive buttons coding can stay here.
        Returns:
        the buttons that have been created in this section

      • splitByChar

        Parameters:

        Returns:
